クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。これによりその呪文が打ち消されたなら、それをオーナーの墓地に置く代わりに追放する。

당신의 턴이 아니라면, 당신은 이 주문의 마나 비용을 지불하는 대신 당신의 손에서 청색 카드 한 장을 추방할 수 있다.
생물이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 그 주문이 이런 식으로 무효화되면, 그 주문을 소유자의 무덤에 넣는 대신 추방한다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Você pode até tentar."

rulings.text: Kumena’s Speaker gets only +1/+1 from its ability, no matter how many Merfolk and Islands you control.

Most nonbasic lands that produce blue mana aren’t Islands. For example, Glacial Fortress isn’t an Island. Some nonbasic lands (such as Irrigated Farmland from the Amonkhet set) do have basic land types printed on the type line and may be Islands.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, the damage Kumena’s Speaker takes during combat may become lethal if you no longer control a Merfolk or Island later in the turn.

name: Merfolk Trickster
original_text:
Flash
When Merfolk Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It loses all abilities until end of turn.

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re casting a spell or activating an ability, no player may take other actions until the spell or ability has been paid for. Notably, players can’t try to remove a permanent’s activated abilities to stop them from happening. Once activated, the ability on the stack will resolve even if the creature loses the ability.
If the target creature has an ability that triggers when it becomes tapped, that ability triggers before it loses all abilities.

If the target creature has power and toughness written as */* with an ability that defines its power and toughness, it’s 0/0 when it loses all abilities. If its power and toughness are written as */*+1, it’s 0/1, and so on.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Flooded Strand
original_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

foreign_names.name: 魂の洞窟
foreign_names.text:
魂の洞窟が戦場に出るに際し、クリーチャー・タイプ１つを選ぶ。
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、選ばれたタイプのクリーチャー・呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用でき、その呪文は打ち消されない。

name: Cavern of Souls
original_text:
As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

rulings.text: You must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Warrior. Card types such as artifact can’t be chosen.

The spell can’t be countered if the mana produced by Cavern of Souls is spent to cover any cost of the spell, even an additional cost such as a kicker cost. This is true even if you use the mana to pay an additional cost while casting a spell “without paying its mana cost.”

text:
As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

foreign_names.name: 霊気の薬瓶
foreign_names.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは霊気の薬瓶の上に蓄積カウンターを１個置いてもよい。
{T}：あなたはあなたの手札から、点数で見たマナ・コストが霊気の薬瓶の上に置かれている蓄積カウンターの個数に等しいクリーチャー・カード１枚を戦場に出してもよい。

foreign_names.name: 乙太精瓶
foreign_names.text:
在你的维持开始时，你可以在乙太精瓶上放置一个充电指示物。
{T}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场，其总法术力费用须与乙太精瓶上的充电指示物数量相同。

name: Aether Vial
original_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial.
{T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If Aether Vial leaves the battlefield while its second ability is on the stack, use its last known number of charge counters to determine what you may put from your hand onto the battlefield.
If a card in a player’s hand has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

text:

flavor: Where dragons once slept, their bones now rest.

foreign_names.flavor: Wo Drachen einst schliefen, ruhen nun ihre Knochen.
foreign_names.name: Gefluteter Strand
foreign_names.text: {T}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, opfere den Gefluteten Strand: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Ebene- oder Insel-Karte und bringe sie ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.flavor: Allá donde en otro tiempo dormían los dragones, ahora descansan sus huesos.
foreign_names.name: Playa anegada
foreign_names.text: {T}, pagar 1 vida, sacrificar la Playa anegada: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de llanura o isla y ponla en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.flavor: Là où les dragons sommeillèrent jadis, leurs os reposent désormais.
foreign_names.name: Grève inondée
foreign_names.text: {T}, payez 1 point de vie, sacrifiez la Grève inondée : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de plaine ou d'île et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.flavor: Dove un tempo dormivano i draghi, ora riposano le loro ossa.
foreign_names.name: Spiaggia Allagata
foreign_names.text: {T}, Paga 1 punto vita, Sacrifica la Spiaggia Allagata: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Pianura o Isola e mettila sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.flavor: かつて龍たちが眠りについた場所には、今では彼らの骨が眠っている。
foreign_names.name: 溢れかえる岸辺
foreign_names.text: {T}, ライフを１点支払う, 溢れかえる岸辺を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから平地・カードか島・カードを１枚探し、それを戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.flavor: 한때 용들이 잠들던 이곳에는 이제 용의 뼈만 잠들어 있다.
foreign_names.name: 물이 넘치는 개울
foreign_names.text: {T}, 생명 1점을 지불한다, 물이 넘치는 개울을 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 들이나 섬 카드 한 장을 찾아 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Onde os dragões um dia dormiram, hoje descansam seus ossos.
foreign_names.name: Praia Inundada
foreign_names.text: {T}, Pague 1 ponto de vida, Sacrifique Praia Inundada: Procure um card de Planície ou Ilha em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreign_names.flavor: Там, где когда-то спали драконы, теперь покоятся их кости.
foreign_names.name: Затопленная Пойма
foreign_names.text: {T}, заплатите 1 жизнь, пожертвуйте Затопленную Пойму: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Равнины или Острова и положите ее на поле битвы. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.flavor: 群龙栖息处，空余骨安眠。
foreign_names.name: 潮没水滨
foreign_names.text: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲潮没水滨：从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原或海岛牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.flavor: 群龍棲息處，空餘骨安眠。
foreign_names.name: 潮沒水濱
foreign_names.text: {T}，支付1點生命，犧牲潮沒水濱：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張平原或海島牌，並將之放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
